Finding simpler ways to make websites

In this show we chat, learn and build websites and share our attempts to make them easier to maintain.

Our focus is on:
  • HTML and CSS (with a smidge of JS if not too scary).
  • Reducing dependencies.
  • Not trying to be cleverer than we are.
  • Standards, accessibility and anything to makes the web better for all.
